Package kaitech.model

Class LoyaltyCardImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • kaitech.model.LoyaltyCardImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LoyaltyCard
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    LoyaltyCardTblImpl.DbLoyaltyCard
    public class LoyaltyCardImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements LoyaltyCard
    Implements the LoyaltyCard interface; used to store details about a loyalty card.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private org.joda.money.Money balance
      Spendable points on the card, to be discounted from the cost of the order if chosen to by the holder
      private java.lang.String customerName
      Customer name, optional
      private int id
      Unique ID for each customers card
      private java.time.LocalDate lastPurchase
      Last time card used, cannot be used more than a year after last purchase
